When the current HP of an enemy decreases and reaches a threshold, it will drop particle(s) or orb(s).

Some enemies may only have one threshold (mostly 0% of max HP), while some enemies may have 4 thresholds (such as 75%, 50%, 25% and 0% of max HP).

'''Note:''' Some enemies will drop more than one particle or orb when their HP reach thresholds, but it seems like they only drop one particle or orb in the screen. Maybe the system merges particles or orbs into one particle or orb in visual effects.

For some enemies, particle(s) or orb(s) come from skills of enemies.

HP Drop Table comes from Chinese articles in NGA forum<ref>NGA: [https://bbs.nga.cn/read.php?tid=25178419 Energy HP Drop from Enemies]</ref><ref>NGA: [https://bbs.nga.cn/read.php?tid=26932608 Energy from Characters and Enemies]</ref> and the article in KQM Library.<ref>KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_z2tKyqWCybPGHGFBhibtfSeHm3by6aCME_OakNz7-8/htmlview Particles HP Drop from Enemies]</ref> The Chinese article uses the internal data from GitHub<ref>Source Data: [https://github.com/Dimbreath/GenshinData/blob/main/Excel/MonsterExcelConfigData.json Enemies]</ref> and does experiments for verifying the data. The article in KQM Library also makes video clips for evidences.

==Energy Generated by Enemy Abilities==
Some enemies will generate Elemental Orbs or Particles when certain conditions are met, such as when they perform a specific attack. See the Abilities and Attacks sections of their respective pages for details.

Enemies with the ability to generate Energy include:
{{Enemies by Category List|Energy Generation Enemies|header=1}}
